    • Class se.hig.oodp.b9.logic.Table extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream stream)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
          Method to override the standard functionality of the serialization's deserialization

          Used to set the final field to a new value on deserialization

          To be considered ugly hax (however, it is run before anything tries to access it, so we should be fine)


          Inspiration from:
          • Olivier Croisier
          • Rafael Winterhalter
          Throws:
          java.lang.Exception - if fails

      • Serialized Fields

        • players

          java.util.List<E> players
          The players at this table

          The index of the player that is next to make a move

          Mapping to the players' hands

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> playerPoints
          Mapping to the players' points (the cards the player can get points for)

          The pool with cards on the table
